short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your notes in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily create, organize, and manage your notes directly in your browser with a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension.

Quick Actions: Copy or delete notes with a single click.
Effortless Editing: Double-click to edit any note instantly.
Flexible Organization: Drag and drop to reorder your notes, and organize them into groups.
Customizable Themes: Switch between dark and light modes for a comfortable experience.
Export Notes: Save your notes as .txt files for easy backup.

Perfect for keeping short or long-term notes at your fingertips.
